trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to store an element of the wrong type within an array.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试在数组内存储错误类型的元素时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown when the system cannot convert the element to the type declared for the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 系统无法将元素转换成为数组声明的类型时引发。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type <xref:System.String> cannot be stored in an <xref:System.Int32> array because conversion between these types is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，类型的元素<xref:System.String>不能存储在<xref:System.Int32>数组因为不支持这些类型之间的转换。

trans-unit.source: It is generally unnecessary for applications to throw this exception.
trans-unit.target: 它是通常不必要的应用程序引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The following Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instructions throw <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> :
trans-unit.target: 以下 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令引发<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>:

trans-unit.source: ldelem.\<type>
trans-unit.target: ldelem.\<type>

trans-unit.source: ldelema
trans-unit.target: ldelema

trans-unit.source: stelem.\<type>
trans-unit.target: stelem.\<type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARRAYTYPEMISMATCH, which has the value 0x80131503.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARRAYTYPEMISMATCH，其值 0x80131503。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>, see the <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>，请参阅<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates scenarios where <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示方案其中<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Source array type cannot be assigned to destination array type."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"数组将源类型不能分配给目标数组类型。"的新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the ArrayTypeMismatchException() constructor of the <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的 ArrayTypeMismatchException() 构造函数<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>类。

trans-unit.source: It contains a function which takes two arrays as arguments and checks whether the two arrays are of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 它包含采用两个数组作为自变量，并检查两个数组是否属于相同类型的函数。

trans-unit.source: If the arrays are of different types, a new <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown and then caught in the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组在不同类型的一个新<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>是引发，然后在调用方法中捕获。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the ArrayTypeMismatchException(String) constructor of the <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的 ArrayTypeMismatchException(String) 构造函数<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>类。

trans-unit.source: It contains a function which takes two arrays as arguments and checks whether the two arrays are of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 它包含采用两个数组作为自变量，并检查两个数组是否属于相同类型的函数。

trans-unit.source: If the arrays are of different types, a new <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown and then caught in the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组在不同类型的一个新<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>是引发，然后在调用方法中捕获。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为空引用，则在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发当前异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>）。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException.%23ctor%2A> constructor of the <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数的<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>类。

trans-unit.source: It contains a function that takes two arrays as arguments and checks whether the two arrays are of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 它包含采用两个数组作为自变量并检查两个数组是否属于同一类型的函数。

trans-unit.source: If the arrays are of different types, a new <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown and then caught in the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组在不同类型的一个新<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>是引发，然后在调用方法中捕获。
